latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to designate/identify a qualified Education Director
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service staff identified/acting as group teachers do not meet the required qualifications of the position
Child care service teaching staff in an infant/toddler program do not meet staff qualification requirements
Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
